content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:moz="http://www.mozilla.org/2006/browser/search/">  <ShortName>mhcten</ShortName>  <Description>Search $10 Million for MHC - Taking on the world was never far from Mary Lyon's mind.</Description>  <Contact>support@wordpress.com</Contact>  <Url type="application/atom+xml" template="http://mhcten.mtholyoke.edu/?s={searchTerms}&feed=atom"/>  <Url type="application/rss+xml"  template="http://mhcten.mtholyoke.edu/?s={searchTerms}&feed=rss2"/>  <Url type="text/html"            template="http://mhcten.mtholyoke.edu/?s={searchTerms}" method="GET" />  <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="/osd.xml" />  <LongName>$10 Million for MHC</LongName>  <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon">http://mhcten.mtholyoke.edu/favicon.ico</Image>  <Image height="64" width="64" type="image/png">http://s0.wp.com/i/logo/gray-white-transparent-64.png</Image>  <Query role="example" searchTerms="photography" />  <Tags>mount-holyoke-college mary-lyon lynn-pasquerella mhc</Tags>  <Developer>Automattic</Developer>  <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight>  <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>  <Language>en</Language>  <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>  <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>  <moz:SearchForm>http://mhcten.mtholyoke.edu</moz:SearchForm> </OpenSearchDescription>
